metadata.synopsis: Possible dialog during the Lake Encounter (if the player jumps on another raft when another player is in dialog)
metadata.how_to_trigger: To trigger in Multiplayer or following these repro steps.REPRO STEPS:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -453.75, 27.06, -541.254. Move to the other raft.5. Talk to Duergar Scout.

0.speaker: Jerris
0.text: One wrong move, and you're goin' in the lake.
